legacy.full_text: Since arriving in #Moscow on Friday night, I have discovered many "interesting" details here. A thread. #UkraineWar

legacy.description: Reporter w/ Global Times. Worked in Latin America for years. Cover fascinating China stories & int’l relations. 中文, English, Español.

legacy.full_text:
….or even any assistance from #China—— Although I didn't ask about Chinese military aid at all.

They argued that #Russia has enough capabilities to deal with the war, and the war may end by the end of the year. #UkraineWar

legacy.full_text: Perhaps in their view, accepting help from other countries is a sign of "showing weakness". This is a nation that likes to show toughness and has strong national pride. #Russia #UkraineWar

legacy.full_text: RT @NeysunM: “Selective decoupling”? In my own view, there is no better guarantor of peace, stability, and economic growth in our world tod…

legacy.description: Administrative law / Chinese law. Director, Penn Project on the Future of U.S.-China Relations. Host @CsccPenn Podcast and @LawAnGovernance.
legacy.name: Neysun Mahboubi

legacy.full_text: “Selective decoupling”? In my own view, there is no better guarantor of peace, stability, and economic growth in our world today than to bind China and the U.S. so closely together that the war hawks on both sides—who only see things through a military lens—are fully boxed in.

legacy.description: We unite, organize, and mobilize progressive forces. Join us.
legacy.name: Progressive International

legacy.full_text:
Today, the Cuban people voted to adopt the most progressive Family Code in the world. 

Over 66% of voters approved an amendment to the constitution that legally redefines what it means to be a family, putting an emphasis on love, human dignity, equality and non-discrimination. https://t.co/wFwVvTDqxU

legacy.full_text: Personal opinion: the biggest impact of Pelosi's visit to #Taiwan may be that it will make the Chinese leadership feel more urgency to resolve the Taiwan question & accelerate the agenda. The odds of #Beijing's military takeover of Taiwan in the next 5 years greatly increases

legacy.description: Reporter w/ Global Times. Worked in Latin America for years. Cover fascinating China stories & int’l relations. 中文, English, Español.

legacy.full_text: The PLA’s exercise, which is considered overreact" by the US, is widely criticized as "weak" by a large number of Chinese netizens on Weibo. This almost one-sided public opinion reaction could mean that if in future the Chinese leader make a decision to reunify #Taiwan by force…

legacy.description: Chief reporter & co-leads @globaltimesnews China desk. Cover fascinating China & world. Based in Paris, NYC before. @newmarkjschool alum. Views are my own.
legacy.name: Qingqing_Chen

legacy.full_text: Xi expressed the sincere sympathy in the message and wished Biden a quick recovery #BidenHasCovid https://t.co/oCMaptXvvN

Compared to Xi’s message to Trump 2 years ago when the former US leader tested positive for #COVID, today’s message includes “sincere” sympathy. But the one for Mr. & Mrs. Trump did not convey this word. Such a small change could be a deliciated signal for US-China relations?
